question.body: Which of the following is the correct order from smallest to largest?

multiple_choice.choice: Hepatic ducts, bile ducts, bile ductules, bile canaliculi
Bile ductules, bile caliculi, bile ducts, heptatic ducts
Bile ducts, bile canaliculi, hepatic ducts, bile ductules
Bile canaliculi,bile ductules, bile ducts, hepatic ducts

response.feedback: Incorrect. This order would be from largest to smallest.
Incorrect. The bile canaliculi are the smallest channels.
Incorrect. The â€“ule ending indicates small. Ductules are smaller than ducts.
Correct. This is the order from smallest to largest.
